articles.title: Americans Say You Need $5.3 Million to Be Considered a Success - Bloomberg

articles.title: Thanksgiving dinner will be a little cheaper this year - Axios
articles.description: A typical Thanksgiving dinner will run about $58 this year, per a new analysis.
articles.content:
